title: Vi with titanic?
body:
So, I was playing shyv with devoured build and played it with the new jgler titanic hydra build... And it is the most OP thing I've ever played with a jgler champ... And I didn't even get that fed early. Anyway, I'm close to getting 6300 ip, and I was considering to get vi... In the end, i decided that I was going to get Ekko! But! Now that the new titanic hydra item came out and it scales with health, I was wandering if it worked really well with Vi, if it does, I may reconsider getting vi instead...

Thanks :D comments below!

replies.body: Tank Vi with Titanic would be fine, it just suffers the problem of being a waste of an item slot on Vi (this is hydra in general), and if your going for AD/Tank stats you kinda just look elsewhere.
don't get ekko he's underpowered and it doesn't feel rewarding to play him anymore.

Passive is 15 or so gold every few min and maybe the bonuses from it for a few seconds till the enemy just kills it. his q lost it's jg clear, it's move and attackspeed utility,  and its duration. w is either 3k+ hp or nothing, e is a chance stun, you miss you get nothing for another 13 sec. his r doesn't damage without ad, the passive attackspeed gained from r cant be used if you can't aa, the only thing he does now is hope he isn't invaded and drag enemies to his team to be beaten
